item.title: Beat Russia the smart way. No escalation required.

item.title: The penny is dead. Long live inflation.
item.description: The U.S. has stopped making cents. Declining purchasing power will make us penniless.

item.description: The Blue Jays inspired real hope. And if you have to finish second, do it the way they did.

item.title: No historical event benefited the world more than the Revolutionary War
item.description: Ken Burns’s “The American Revolution” tells a tale sometimes dismaying but ultimately exhilarating.

item.title: Public norms have been warped. Is the damage permanent?
item.description: Eventually, America will find out whether social discourse’s altering involves a ratchet or pendulum.
